subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Badminton
lead_paragraph: With a $600,000 bounty on the line, Lee Chong Wei of Malaysia took an early lead against Lin Dan of China in the badminton men’s final, but in the end he fell to his archrival.
snippet: With a $600,000 bounty on the line, Lee Chong Wei of Malaysia took an early lead against Lin Dan of China in the badminton men’s final, but in the end he fell to his archrival.
